code: export default function validateLogin(values){var errors={};if(!values.email){}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){errors.email="Email address is invalid";}if(!values.password){errors.password="Password is required";}else if(values.password.length<10){errors.password="Password needs to be more than 10 characters";}return errors;}
